member.name: ITfSystemLangBarItem.SetIcon
member.summary: Modifies the icon displayed for the system language bar menu.
member.param: Contains the handle to the new icon.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The system language bar menu does not allow its icon to be modified.

member.name: ITfSystemLangBarItem.SetTooltipString
member.summary: Modifies the tooltip text displayed for the system language bar menu.
member.param: A string that appears as a tooltip.
Size, in characters, of the string.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The tooltip string for the system language bar menu cannot be modified.

member.name: ITfSystemLangBarItem
member.summary: The ITfSystemLangBarItem interface is implemented by a system language bar menu and is used by a system language bar extension to modify the icon and/or tooltip string displayed for the menu. The extension can obtain an instance of this interface by calling QueryInterface on the object with IID_ITfSystemLangBarItem.
